sqlMap.select: select car.ID, car.INSTITUTION_CODE, car.INSTITUTION_NAME, car.INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, car.INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, car.INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, car.REGIST_REBATE, car.SPREAD_START_DATE, car.SPREAD_END_DATE, car.ACT_STATE, car.IMAGE_URL, car.AUDITOR_LOGINID, car.AUDITOR_NAME, car.AUDITE_DATE, car.AUDITE_MEMO, car.AUDITE_STATE, car.BAGMAN_ID, csb.NAME BAGMAN_NAME, car.PASSWORD, car.APPLY_TYPE, car.CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD car left join crowd_sourcing_bagman csb on car.bagman_id = csb.id where car.ID = #id:DECIMAL#

select * from ( select car.ID, car.INSTITUTION_CODE, car.INSTITUTION_NAME, car.INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, car.INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, car.INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, car.REGIST_REBATE, car.SPREAD_START_DATE, car.SPREAD_END_DATE, car.ACT_STATE, car.IMAGE_URL, car.AUDITOR_LOGINID, car.AUDITOR_NAME, car.AUDITE_DATE, car.AUDITE_MEMO, car.AUDITE_STATE, car.BAGMAN_ID, '' BAGMAN_NAME, car.PASSWORD, car.APPLY_TYPE, car.CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD car where UPPER(car.INSTITUTION_CODE) = UPPER(#institutionCode:VARCHAR#) order by car.CREATE_DATE desc ) where rownum<2

select ID, INSTITUTION_CODE, INSTITUTION_NAME, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, REGIST_REBATE, SPREAD_START_DATE, SPREAD_END_DATE, ACT_STATE, IMAGE_URL, AUDITOR_LOGINID, AUDITOR_NAME, AUDITE_DATE, AUDITE_MEMO, AUDITE_STATE, BAGMAN_ID,BAGMAN_NAME, PASSWORD, APPLY_TYPE, CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

select ID, INSTITUTION_CODE, INSTITUTION_NAME, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, REGIST_REBATE, SPREAD_START_DATE, SPREAD_END_DATE, ACT_STATE, IMAGE_URL, AUDITOR_LOGINID, AUDITOR_NAME, AUDITE_DATE, AUDITE_MEMO, AUDITE_STATE, BAGMAN_ID,BAGMAN_NAME, PASSWORD, APPLY_TYPE, CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD where INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#

select ID, INSTITUTION_CODE, INSTITUTION_NAME, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, REGIST_REBATE, SPREAD_START_DATE, SPREAD_END_DATE, ACT_STATE, IMAGE_URL, AUDITOR_LOGINID, AUDITOR_NAME, AUDITE_DATE, AUDITE_MEMO, AUDITE_STATE, BAGMAN_ID,BAGMAN_NAME, PASSWORD, APPLY_TYPE, CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD where AUDITE_STATE=0 and (INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR# or INSTITUTION_NAME = #institutionName:VARCHAR#) and rownum <= 1

select ID, INSTITUTION_CODE, INSTITUTION_NAME, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, REGIST_REBATE, SPREAD_START_DATE, SPREAD_END_DATE, ACT_STATE, IMAGE_URL, AUDITOR_LOGINID, AUDITOR_NAME, AUDITE_DATE, AUDITE_MEMO, AUDITE_STATE, BAGMAN_ID,BAGMAN_NAME, PASSWORD, APPLY_TYPE, CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD where AUDITE_STATE=0 and UPPER(INSTITUTION_NAME) = UPPER(#institutionName:VARCHAR#) and rownum <= 1

select count(1) from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD where 1=1
and INSTITUTION_NAME like '%'||#institutionName#||'%'
and INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER like '%'||#institutionPhonenumber#||'%'
and INSTITUTION_CODE like '%'||#institutionCode#||'%'
and AUDITE_STATE = #auditStatus#
CREATE_DATE >= #createStart#
CREATE_DATE <= #createEnd#

SELECT * FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY car.AUDITE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY car.ID DESC
ORDER BY car.ID DESC
) AS RN, car.ID, car.INSTITUTION_CODE, car.INSTITUTION_NAME, car.INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, car.INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, car.INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, car.REGIST_REBATE, car.SPREAD_START_DATE, car.SPREAD_END_DATE, car.ACT_STATE, car.IMAGE_URL, car.AUDITOR_LOGINID, car.AUDITOR_NAME, car.AUDITE_DATE, car.AUDITE_MEMO, car.AUDITE_STATE, car.BAGMAN_ID, csb.NAME BAGMAN_NAME, car.PASSWORD, car.APPLY_TYPE, car.CREATE_DATE from CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD car left join crowd_sourcing_bagman csb on car.bagman_id = csb.id where 1=1
and car.INSTITUTION_NAME like '%'||#institutionName#||'%'
and car.INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER like '%'||#institutionPhonenumber#||'%'
and car.INSTITUTION_CODE like '%'||#institutionCode#||'%'
and car.AUDITE_STATE = #auditStatus#
car.CREATE_DATE >= #createStart#
car.CREATE_DATE <= #createEnd#
) WHERE RN BETWEEN #startIndex:DECIMAL# AND #endIndex:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_CR_QR_APP_REC.nextval from dual
insert into CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD (ID, INSTITUTION_CODE, INSTITUTION_NAME, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER, REGIST_REBATE, SPREAD_START_DATE, SPREAD_END_DATE, ACT_STATE, IMAGE_URL, AUDITOR_LOGINID, AUDITOR_NAME, AUDITE_DATE, AUDITE_MEMO, AUDITE_STATE, BAGMAN_ID,BAGMAN_NAME, PASSWORD, APPLY_TYPE, CREATE_DATE) values (#id:DECIMAL#, #institutionCode:VARCHAR#, #institutionName:VARCHAR#, #institutionAddress:VARCHAR#, #institutionContactor:VARCHAR#, #institutionPhonenumber:VARCHAR#, #registRebate:DECIMAL#, #spreadStartDate#, #spreadEndDate#, #actState:DECIMAL#, #imageUrl:VARCHAR#, #auditorLoginId:DECIMAL#, #auditorName:VARCHAR#, #auditeDate#, #auditeMemo:VARCHAR#, #auditeState:DECIMAL#, #bagmanId:DECIMAL#,#bagmanName:VARCHAR#, #password:VARCHAR#, #applyType:DECIMAL#, #createDate#)

select SEQ_CR_QR_APP_REC.nextval from dual
insert into CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD
ID
INSTITUTION_CODE
INSTITUTION_NAME
INSTITUTION_ADDRESS
INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR
INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER
REGIST_REBATE
SPREAD_START_DATE
SPREAD_END_DATE
ACT_STATE
IMAGE_URL
AUDITOR_LOGINID
AUDITOR_NAME
AUDITE_DATE
AUDITE_MEMO
AUDITE_STATE
BAGMAN_ID
BAGMAN_NAME
PASSWORD
APPLY_TYPE
CREATE_DATE
)
values
#id:DECIMAL#
#institutionCode:VARCHAR#
#institutionName:VARCHAR#
#institutionAddress:VARCHAR#
#institutionContactor:VARCHAR#
#institutionPhonenumber:VARCHAR#
#registRebate:DECIMAL#
#spreadStartDate#
#spreadEndDate#
#actState:DECIMAL#
#imageUrl:VARCHAR#
#auditorLoginId:DECIMAL#
#auditorName:VARCHAR#
#auditeDate#
#auditeMemo:VARCHAR#
#auditeState:DECIMAL#
#bagmanId:DECIMAL#
#bagmanName:VARCHAR#
#password:VARCHAR#
#applyType:DECIMAL#
#createDate#
)
sqlMap.update:
update CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD
INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#
INSTITUTION_NAME = #institutionName:VARCHAR#
INSTITUTION_ADDRESS = #institutionAddress:VARCHAR# Â·
INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR = #institutionContactor:VARCHAR#
INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER = #institutionPhonenumber:VARCHAR#
REGIST_REBATE = #registRebate:DECIMAL#
SPREAD_START_DATE = #spreadStartDate#
SPREAD_END_DATE = #spreadEndDate#
ACT_STATE = #actState:DECIMAL#
IMAGE_URL = #imageUrl:VARCHAR#
AUDITOR_LOGINID = #auditorLoginId:DECIMAL#
AUDITOR_NAME = #auditorName:VARCHAR#
AUDITE_DATE = #auditeDate#
AUDITE_MEMO = #auditeMemo:VARCHAR#
AUDITE_STATE = #auditeState:DECIMAL#
BAGMAN_ID = #bagmanId:DECIMAL#
BAGMAN_NAME = #bagmanName:VARCHAR#
PASSWORD = #password:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TYPE = #applyType:DECIMAL#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate#
where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD set INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#, INSTITUTION_NAME = #institutionName:VARCHAR#, INSTITUTION_ADDRESS = #institutionAddress:VARCHAR#, INSTITUTION_CONTACTOR = #institutionContactor:VARCHAR#, INSTITUTION_PHONENUMBER = #institutionPhonenumber:VARCHAR#, REGIST_REBATE = #registRebate:DECIMAL#, SPREAD_START_DATE = #spreadStartDate#, SPREAD_END_DATE = #spreadEndDate#, ACT_STATE = #actState:DECIMAL#, IMAGE_URL = #imageUrl:VARCHAR#, AUDITOR_LOGINID = #auditorLoginId:DECIMAL#, AUDITOR_NAME = #auditorName:VARCHAR#, AUDITE_DATE = #auditeDate#, AUDITE_MEMO = #auditeMemo:VARCHAR#, AUDITE_STATE = #auditeState:DECIMAL#, BAGMAN_ID = #bagmanId:DECIMAL#, BAGMAN_NAME = #bagmanName:VARCHAR#, PASSWORD = #password:VARCHAR#, APPLY_TYPE = #applyType:DECIMAL#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update CROWD_INSTITUTION_APPLY_RECORD set AUDITOR_LOGINID = #auditorLoginId:DECIMAL#, AUDITOR_NAME = #auditorName:VARCHAR#, AUDITE_DATE = SYSDATE, AUDITE_MEMO = #auditeMemo:VARCHAR#, AUDITE_STATE = #auditeState:DECIMAL# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
